divs: Sighting DetailsWalked out side to take my son home from my mothers looked up above my house and seen a big multilight flashing thing in the sky ran in and got my 3 nephews who are 20 26 18 and 17 we all stared at it then my nephew got the binoculars and we looked at it thru them and couldn't see any real defining shape it was nothing but the colored flashing lights another one to the left of us appearred. I'm scared and just want any explanation for this please?! The objects are still here. My kids are scared I'm scared just want to know its nothing.... It is midnight here the skies are clear I'm not a weirdo crazy lady There is something hovering over my town I can see it my son has a video of it please tell me it's nothing.
Summary: Scary. 2 objects same in every way. I'm scared. What is it?
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ponca City
There were no other sightings in Ponca City on or around November 20th 2012
